mapper.select: SELECT r.`number`, r.`title`, r.`description`, room.number AS room_name, e.name AS equipment_name, user.`login_name` AS send_user_name, r.`send_time`, r.`state`, user.`login_name` AS get_user_name, r.`get_time`, r.`done_time`, r.`result`, r.`money` FROM `repair` r LEFT JOIN room ON r.`room_id`=room.id LEFT JOIN equipment e ON e.id= r.`equipment_id` LEFT JOIN `user` ON user.id=r.`send_user_id` LEFT JOIN `user` u ON u.id=r.`get_user_id` WHERE r.deleted=0 AND r.id={id}
